Empathy 1.0 documentation
previous | next | modules | index

menuinterface module¶

Module grouping all the templates for the interface elements and initialization of sound and graphic settings.

class menuinterface.ActionPopup(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivy.uix.popup.Popup

Basic template for a popup.

closePopupButton(popup)[source]¶

Extends MenuButton. Provide a button generation for closing a popup.

class menuinterface.BasicScreen(**kw)[source]¶

Bases: kivy.uix.screenmanager.Screen

Template for basic screen, providing mechanism of playing background sound.

on_enter(*args)[source]¶

Start looping appropriate background sound on entering the screen.

on_leave(*args)[source]¶

Stop looping background sound on leaving the current screen.

class menuinterface.CustomSlider(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivy.uix.slider.Slider

Basic template for horizontal slider.

class menuinterface.FontSettings[source]¶

Bases: object

Setting the fonts for the current game.

Variables:fontName (string) – name of the current font from the saved settings
fontName = 'Roboto'¶
classmethod registerFonts()[source]¶

Register the current font from the saved settings for the use with the current game.

In case of lack of font sets Roboto as the default font for the game.

class menuinterface.MainMenuButton(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: menuinterface.MenuButton

Extends MenuButton. Provide a link back to main menu.

class menuinterface.MenuBoxLayout(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivy.uix.boxlayout.BoxLayout

Basic box layout template for all the gameplay.

class menuinterface.MenuButton(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivy.uix.button.Button

Template for basic menu button, setting the look and sounds of a button.

on_press()[source]¶

Play the click sound with sound volume from the saved settings on clicking the button.

class menuinterface.SoundSettings[source]¶

Bases: object

Setting and playing the sounds for the current game.

Variables:soundVolume (float) – numeric proprty, in the reange 0-1
static getAudioFilePath(requestedSound)[source]¶

Provide path to the specified sound file.

Parameters:requestedSound (str) – name of the requested sound
Returns:path to the requested sound file
Return type:string
static playMusic(sound)[source]¶

Play the specified sound in a loop with the sound volume from saved settings.

Parameters:sound (str) – name of the sound to be played
soundVolume = None¶
